name: 10000 To The Boss
description:
10000 To The Boss

is a single person, low poly, cartoony, 3d FPS shooter made in the Unity Engine, everything I have made on my one including art and music, I put a lot of effort into the game, but I would love to learn how to get better as a developer so I would love to hear what others think.

Controls:

WASD: For Movement

123: Switch Weapon

G: Throw Grenade

R: Reload

ESC: Pause Menu
